programme.desc: Set in 18th century Korea, long-ruling King Yeongjo must take extreme measures in order to deal with his heir, the Crown prince Sado, when he is accused of plotting treason by his biological mother.

programme.title: Making Family
programme.desc: Raised by a single mom in Korea, Tae Bong has always wanted know who his dad was. He discovers that his dad is a young Chinese man who had donated sperm years ago and sets out to meet him.

programme.title: Christmas in August
programme.desc: A young man who owns a photo studio suffers from a fatal disease. He meets a policewoman and falls in love with her. What will be the fate of this love - will it be a tragic ending?

programme.title: Along With the Gods: the Two Worlds
programme.desc: Having died unexpectedly, firefighter Ja-hong is taken to the afterlife by 3 guardians. To reincarnate, he must pass 7 trials in 49 days to prove that he led an upright life while he was still living.

programme.title: Kim Ji Young, Born 1982
programme.desc: Kim Ji-young, an ordinary Korean woman in her 30s, suddenly shows signs of being inhabited by her late mother and older sister after she becomes a stay-at-home mother.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: Double Patty
programme.desc: The relationship of Woo-ram and Hyun-ji begins when he order a double patty in the hamburger shop she works.

programme.title: Mother
programme.desc: When her mentally challenged son becomes the prime suspect in a murder, his mother does whatever it takes to clear his name.

programme.title: Fists of Legend
programme.desc: Based on webcomic 'Legendary Fist', three old friends and rivals get set to face off on a TV program billed as 'The Greatest Fight Show on Earth' and battle it out for the big prize.

programme.desc: A conceited former idol and A-list actor is sent to a remote island after causing trouble. Forced to get used to his surroundings, he eventually falls in love with an islander.
